title: Copy base components and extend FragmentInput
description:
## Objective

Copy all reusable components from FO-10 to FO-11 and extend FragmentInput with mode="words" for single-word tone chips.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md — Sections: "Reuse from FO-10", "FragmentInput Mode Extension"

## Scope

**Files to create (copy from app/fo-10/components/):**
- app/fo-11/components/step-welcome.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-familiarity.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-goal.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/heart-animation.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/affirmation-card-flow.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/affirmation-card.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/affirmation-summary.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-background.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-notifications.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-paywall.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-completion.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/fragment-input.tsx (copy + extend)

## Implementation

1. Copy all listed components from app/fo-10/components/ to app/fo-11/components/
2. In step-goal.tsx: update import from '../types' — the FO-11 types use FO11_GOAL_QUESTION instead of FO10_QUESTIONS[0]
3. In step-familiarity.tsx: no functional changes needed (cosmetic only — familiarity value stays in UI state but wont be passed to agents)
4. In fragment-input.tsx: Add mode="words" support:
   - Add "words" to the mode union type: mode?: 'sentences' | 'fragments' | 'words'
   - When mode="words": remove max-w-[200px] constraint, remove whitespace-normal text-left, add text-center
   - When mode="words": clicking a chip appends the word (same as sentence mode — no "..." removal)
   - Keep all existing modes working identically
5. Fix any FO-10-specific imports to reference FO-11 types

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — all copied components compile

Run: npx tsc --noEmit

Do NOT close until tests pass.
closed_reason: Copied 11 base components from FO-10 to FO-11, updated step-goal to use FO11_GOAL_QUESTION, extended FragmentInput with mode=words (removes max-w/whitespace constraints, adds text-center), added helperText prop. npx tsc --noEmit passes clean.
